messages.content: Hi, I need to onboard a new employee. Can you help me verify their documents and set up their account?

content.text: Of course! I will begin by verifying the employee's documents.

content.content: {"status": "failure", "error": "Document verification failed due to missing signatures."}

content.text: It seems the document verification failed because of missing signatures. I'll need to send this for human validation.

content.content: {"status": "validated", "comment": "Missing areas located, signatures required from both employee and manager."}

content.text: The document has been validated with comments. Signatures from both employee and manager are required. Meanwhile, I'll attempt to create the employee's account.

messages.content: Unfortunately, there was an issue setting up the employee's account due to a payment being declined. Please check with the finance department to resolve this payment authorization problem before proceeding with the account setup. Once resolved, the account creation process can be retried.
